description:
Gear Aid’s seam sealer cures to a flexible urethane rubber, sticks well, and lasts a long time. It also works well as an adhesive to glue on repair fabrics. Moisture speeds curing. Use sparingly as a thin film for best effectiveness. Store in the freezer once opened.

  • Comes in a 1oz. squeeze tube
  • Note: will not successfully adhere to silicone-treated fabrics
name: Gear Aid Seam Grip+WP Waterproof Sealant and Adhesive 28g
